thread.title: Russia sends warships close to Britain, again

title: Russia sends warships close to Britain, again
text:
Russia sends warships close to Britain, again Tuesday, January 09, 2018 - 01:10 
A British frigate escorted Russian ships through the English Channel on Monday, Britain's defense ministry said, adding that it was the latest sign of an upsurge in Russian naval activity near UK waters during the holidays.   
A British frigate escorted Russian ships through the English Channel on Monday, Britain's defense ministry said, adding that it was the latest sign of an upsurge in Russian naval activity near UK waters during the holidays.  //reut.rs/2CVkCG9
